CountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
Prom Dates is an upcoming American coming-of-age comedy film directed by Kim Nguyen, written by D.J. Mausner,[1] and starring Julia Lester and Antonia Gentry.[2]
Prom Dates is scheduled to be released by Hulu on May 3, 2024.


Premise[edit]
Two friends make a pact to have the best prom ever. However, when they unexpectedly break up with their dates, they must find new dates before prom begins.

Cast[edit]
Julia Lester
Antonia Gentry
JT Neal
Jordan Buhat
Zión Moreno
Terry Hu
John Michael Higgins
Chelsea Handler
Production[edit]
American High, Hartbeat Productions,[3]  and LD Entertainment produced the film.[4] Prom Dates began production in Syracuse, New York[5][6] in 2023.[7] In November 2023, Hulu bought the right to distribute the film.[8] On March 11, 2024, a preview for the film was released.[9]

Release[edit]
The film will be released on May 3, 2024, through Hulu.[10]
